        public void drawCard(int cardNumber)
              throws WindowCardAssociationException
        Method that draws WindowCard.
        Parameters:
        cardNumber - Refers to the amount of WindowCards dealt during a game. cardNumber = 2*PlayerNumber + 1.
        Throws:
        WindowCardAssociationException

      • chooseWindowCard

                             int side)
        Method that lets the Player choose either taking the front or the back of a given WindowCard.
        Parameters:
        w - Refers to a WindowCard.
        side - Refers to a side of the WindowCard.
